Pacman.View
Class GUI

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      Pacman.View.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, GUIInterface
public class GUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable, GUIInterface

The view. This class manages the window including the buttons and the drawing of the graphics-panel.

See Also:
Serialized Form
